tool_description: Wonder how Twitter bros find new cryptos? Find new [ETH] tokens as they are born and ready to gain momentum. See whether you find your next Shiba Inu/Dogecoin before your friends do!
title: Ethereum Sentiments

api_list.name: Crypto Sentiments - Ethereum tokens
api_list.description: This API queries Uniswap for new  tokens and are ready to gain momentum.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-sentiments.p.rapidapi.com/ethSentiments"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-sentiments.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
